name: HEADS (DDD Wares)
description:
Hello this is a game where you cut off heads, use the Numpad to move the cursor in the direction of the line. You need a numpad or you can't play, sorry.

This is a very early version and as such it's a proof of concept more than anything. But it is feature complete and you are able to finish the game so that's nice. I'm releasing this just so it doesn't sit forgotten on a hard drive somewhere forever.

If you like this game and would like me to finish it then be sure to let me know either here or twitter (I'll get your message sooner on twitter @depdrawers if its super mega urgent).

The "0" key on the numpad acts as enter and "skip" in game. You have to alt-f4 to get out of the game and the options menu doesn't work yet, sorry!
